meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>famous</kanji> <kanji>honor</kanji> is still an <vocabulary>honor</vocabulary>, but it is also a <vocabulary>prestige</vocabulary> to have, since you are famously honorable. So prestigious!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
